page.title: 03Bluemans Park
page.content: Bluemans park is small. There is a small football field..There are three swings and a seasaw which is made of wood. There are monkey bars, a biggish climbing fram and three swings. Everything in the park is made of wood. The park has been there for about 6 years. Some childrens' mums and dads and other people got together and thought that there was not much for the children to do so they raised lots of money by having jumble sales and sales of ware. They pay Mr Pile Â£50 a year to rent the field. A lady called Mrs Winston is the chairman of the committee to raise the money for the park.
